sentences.sContent: I ground my cigarette into the ashtray.
sentences.sContent_eng: I ground my cigarette into the ashtray.
sentences.sCn: 我把香烟掐灭后扔入烟灰缸。

sentences.sContent: Drop your cigarette ashes into the ashtray.
sentences.sContent_eng: Drop your cigarette ashes into the ashtray.
sentences.sCn: 请把香烟灰弹在烟灰缸里。

sentences.sContent: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.sContent_eng: He stubbed out his cigarette in the ashtray.
sentences.sCn: 他在烟灰缸内捻灭了他的香烟。

trans.tranOther: a small dish where you put used cigarettes
